forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High near 65F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low near 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 62F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 16C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 61F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 18C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 64F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 10C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 57F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 16C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 60F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 50F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain developing later in the day. High 61F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High near 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High around 60F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
